name: T - Marica Lily
_source: speak;Marica; I haven't even been with the village guard for a month,{w} and the place has already been completely destroyed{tgm}...{tgm}{w} What a great recruit I ended up being{tgm}...
speak;Marica; What was the point of me joining anyway{tgm}...{tgm}?{w} I wasn't strong enough to help drive the monsters back{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I couldn't save anyone-
speak;Lily; Talking yourself down isn't going to help anyone.{w} No amount of beating yourself up is going to turn back time,{w} so stop it.
speak;Marica; Nobody would've wanted to see me drag my heels anyway.{w} I should keep my head held high for them!{w} Thanks for the talk, Lily.{w} Let's go avenge our friends!
speak;Lily; I meant that it would bring down her performance,{w} but whatever keeps her alive{tgm}...
